cards.title: Bridge Disaster
body: When this card enters play, it deals the Responder with the lowest HP 2 cold damage.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the {H - 1} hero targets with the highest HP 2 cold damage each.
cards.flavorText: Impact grunted with the strain. “I'll{BR}worry about those cars when the{BR}bridge stops collapsing.” Cricket{BR}leaped past him, yelling “I got 'em.”

cards.title: Citywide Carnage
body: When this card enters play, it deals each Responder 2 energy damage.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals each hero target 1 toxic damage and each villain target 1 energy damage.
cards.flavorText: “Not me this time,” shrugged Pyre,{BR}as another explosion went off two{BR}blocks away. “I'm betting it's still{BR}somehow your fault,” said Vanish.

cards.title: Cracked Water Main
body: When this card enters play, it deals 1 Responder 2 melee damage.
Reduce all damage dealt by non-environment cards by 1.
cards.flavorText: Whose mascot are you supposed{BR}to be? Dynamo called out.{BR}Gyrosaur, alarmed by the rising{BR}water, curled into her shell.

cards.title: Crashed Tanker
body: When this card enters play, it deals the Responder with the lowest HP 2 fire damage.
At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the target with the second highest HP {H - 1} fire damage.
cards.flavorText: Windmill City's technology district{BR}had been renowned worldwide for{BR}almost a century, which attracted{BR}plenty of criminal activity.

cards.title: Detective Sedrick
body: When this card enters play, it deals 1 target 3 projectile damage.
At the start of the environment turn, the players may destroy 1 Emergency card. If a card is destroyed this way, 1 hero target regains 2HP.
cards.flavorText: “There's a right way to do things,” said{BR}the detective, blowing on his coffee.{BR}“Most of these vigilantes are hardly{BR}better than criminals themselves.”

cards.title: Frame Job
body: When this card enters play, reveal cards from the top of the environment deck until a Responder is revealed, put it into play, and discard the other revealed cards.
Redirect all damage dealt by Responders to the hero target with the highest HP.
At the start of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: The swat team had surrounded the{BR}building and begun working their way up{BR}floor by floor. Without her mask, Kate{BR}was quickly running out of options.

cards.title: Gearlock
body: Reduce damage dealt to this card by {H - 1}.
Whenever this card is dealt damage, it deals the source of that damage 3 lightning damage.
When this card is reduced to 0 HP, play the top card of each hero deck in turn order.
cards.flavorText: No one knew where the city's criminal element obtained such advanced tech and weaponry. Not even Echelon had been able to track down the source.

cards.title: Gray Pharmaceutical Building
body: Whenever a hero uses a power that deals damage, increase that damage by 2.
After a hero uses a power on a non-character card, destroy that card.
At the start of the environment turn, destroy this card.
cards.flavorText: Despite its ruined public image and{BR}the loss of its CEO, the biotech{BR}giant showed no signs of changing{BR}its dangerous business practices.

cards.title: Injured Worker
body: When this card enters play, it deals the Responder wth the lowest HP 2 melee damage. Then move this card next to the hero with the highest HP.
Increase the first damage dealt to that hero each turn by 1.
cards.flavorText: In the chaos of the villains'{BR}coordinated attacks, the remaining{BR}First Response members ignored the{BR}city's stance on costumed heroes.

cards.title: Intrepid Reporter
body: When this card enters play, 2 players may each draw a card.
At the start of the environment turn, the players may destroy 1 Emergency card. If a card is destroyed this way, 1 player may draw a card.
cards.flavorText: As the battle raged overhead, Ellen{BR}Easter and the Channel 14 camera crew{BR}provided emergency responders with{BR}valuable information on the scene.

cards.title: Iron Wasp
cards.body: At the start of the environment turn, this card deals each hero target X melee damage, where X is the current HP of this card.
cards.flavorText: “I will destroy you all!” screamed the{BR}maniac, over the rising hum of her{BR}suit powering up. Cricket resigned herself{BR}to being late for class again.

cards.title: Rain of Debris
body: When this card enters play, it deals the Responder wth the lowest HP 2 melee damage.
At the end of the environment turn, each hero may discard a card. This card deals any hero that did not discard a card this way 2 melee damage.
cards.flavorText: Ambuscade thumbed the detonator and{BR}waved. “Bon voyage!” To his surprise, the{BR}newcomer launched himself from the{BR}falling debris, back onto the structure.

cards.title: Save the day
body: When this card enters play, play the top card of the environment deck.
Whenever a hero card destroys a villain target, 1 Responder regains 1HP.
cards.flavorText: Mere paces from her, the twisted{BR}creatures stopped suddenly. As one,{BR}they turned to face the ruined street,{BR}where a new figure now stood.

cards.title: W.C.P.D. Squad
body: When this card enters play, it deals each villain target 1 projectile damage.
At the start of the environment turn, the players may destroy 1 Emergency card. If a card is destroyed this way, this card deals 1 target 3 projectile damage.
cards.flavorText: The city's police force was{BR}extremely effective, perhaps due to{BR}the high number of superpowered{BR}rogues they had to contend with.

cards.title: W.C.P.D. 'Chariot'
body: At the end of the environment turn, this card deals the non-environment target with the second lowest HP {H - 1} projectile damage.
If a hero target would be dealt damage this way, that hero may discard 2 cards to redirect that damage to a non-environment target.
cards.flavorText: “Halt,” blared the police drone, “you{BR}have been identified as a wanted{BR}criminal.” Pyre's fist began to glow.{BR}“I'm flattered, really,” he replied.
